thread.title: Fox Super Bowl pregame show includes Bill O’Reilly interview with Donald Trump
thread.title_full: Fox Super Bowl pregame show includes Bill O’Reilly interview with Donald Trump

author: Saba Hamedy
title: Fox Super Bowl pregame show includes Bill O’Reilly interview with Donald Trump
text:
President Elect Donald Trump can now join your Super Bowl Sunday festivities — should you decide to watch Fox News.
On Tuesday, the network said its anchor Bill O'Reilly will interview the soon-to-be President during FOX's Super Bowl pregame show.
SEE ALSO: Meryl Streep’s Globes speech was beautiful, heartfelt and played right into Donald Trump’s hands 
"The interview will take place at the White House earlier in the day and cover an array of topics," the network said in a press release.
BIG NEWS: Bill O'Reilly will interview @realDonaldTrump prior to the Super Bowl on @FOXTV . Find details here: https://t.co/nraOPbR8RM 
— Bill O'Reilly (@oreillyfactor) January 17, 2017 
The interview will air on Feb. 5, beginning at approximately 4:00 p.m. EST.
It will also air on The O’Reilly Factor on Monday Feb. 6. After the program, the entire discussion will be available online on Fox News' website.
BONUS: Steve Jobs White House ad
